name: HC Capital Management LTD
goal: HC Capital is a company focused on a number of West and Central African countries.  Our goals consist of attracting European companies and investment agencies that have an interest in Africa.  In addition we invest and develop affordable and inclusive retail, housing and industrial projects that address the lower and lower-middle segments of our markets.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Environment, International co-operation and development
euInitiatives:
ONE. The EU initiative of increasing development funding by blending and seeking further partnerships with the public and private sector

TWO. The EU initiative of environment and climate by focusing on clean water & sanitation programs for our developments, in addition to building resilient infrastructure
